_header: King Hart in his comely castle strong
_description: King Hart, attributed to Gavin Douglas — 960 lines in 8-line stanzas

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
King hart in to his cumlie castell strangClosit about with craft
                    and meikill vre…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…This brokin speir sum tyme wes stiff and stoutTo hir I leif
                    bot se it want the heid
CamMagPep2553.Attributed Author:
Quod maister gavvin douglas Bishop of dunkeld (contemporary) (p.
                    256)
